newsitem.title: UK: HSBC shares up ahead of 1996 results.
newsitem.headline: HSBC shares up ahead of 1996 results.

text.p: Shares in HSBC were higher on Friday as investors piled into the market ahead of the banks 1996 figures out on Monday, traders said.
HSBC shares were 19p higher at 15.82 stg by 1600 GMT.
"There's a stock shortage, and no-one wants to be short ahead of the figures," one market-maker said.
HSBC is expected to announce 1996 pre-tax profits of more than 4.6 billion stg, compared with 3.67 billion stg in 1995, traders said.
The bank was also expected to raise it's dividend to around 40p from 32p the previous year, dealers said.
HSBC's Hong Kong curreny shares also strengthened as investors snapped up the stock ahead of results, dealers in Honk Kong shares said.
